dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: The FPHA dataset includes 1175 skeletons belonging to 45 action categories performed by 6 different individuals in 3 scenarios. Action categories are highly variable with inter and intra subject variability including style, speed, scale and viewpoint.
dcterms:title: First-Person Hand Action (FPHA) dataset
